Title: Authorizes the county of Ulster to offer an optional twenty year retirement plan to certain deputy sheriffs employed by such county
Summary: Authorizes the county of Ulster to offer an optional twenty year retirement plan to Kyle Frano, Joseph Sciutto and Emmett Vedder III, deputy sheriffs employed by the county of Ulster.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize the county of Ulster to offer an optional twenty year retirement plan to certain deputy sheriffs employed by such county
